title: Enhancing Service Quality Competencies: Simulation-Based Learning Transfer Support for Science Field Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can transfer scientific problem-solving processes from VR simulation environments to actual work contexts with over 80% applicability
Learners can derive and implement at least three strategies linking personal value systems with organizational objectives
Learners can establish and evaluate an action plan to apply learning content to real-world tasks by reflecting on mentoring feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
